project.name: Scrollable-Clickable-Content-Accordion-to-Enhance-UX-While-Maintaining-SEO-FC84

description.summary: This project features a simple CSS accordion that allows users to hide or display content sections by clicking on titles.
details: Ideal for long pages, such as legal notices or product specifications, as it reduces page length and simplifies navigation.
Enhances user experience by presenting content in a compact manner.
Each section can contain text, images, or other HTML elements.
Particularly beneficial for long web pages with a significant amount of text.
Helps users navigate and find information without being overwhelmed by extensive content.

features: Paragraph texts are scrollable, reducing the height of the text contents.
Decreases the page size in terms of length to scroll for users.
Contributes to a smoother and more enjoyable navigation.
